Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

HWAVESYNTH

The basic type HWAVESYNTH is a handle to an open wave synthesizer.

Discussion

HWAVESYNTH handles are returned from the AIL_create_wave_synthesizer function.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AIL_create_wave_synthesizer, AIL_destroy_wave_synthesizer
